name: Google Takeout
notes: Comprehensive export tool for most Google services. You can select specific products and data types to include in your archive. Larger exports may take longer.

name: Facebook
notes: The 'Download Your Information' tool allows you to get a copy of your content and information, including posts, photos, comments, and activity logs. You can customize the date range and format.

name: Twitter (X)
notes: Archive includes tweets, direct messages, media (photos/videos), followers, following, and more. It may take a few hours for your archive to be ready for download.

name: Instagram
notes: Request your data through your settings or the mobile app. Photos and videos will be organized in separate folders within the downloaded archive. Processing time depends on data volume.

name: LinkedIn
notes: LinkedIn offers multiple data archives: connections, messages, job applications, account activity, and more. You can select specific categories for export.

name: GitHub
notes: Account data and repository exports are separate processes. For repositories, standard Git cloning operations are used. Account data is available via settings.

name: Spotify
notes: Found under 'Download your data' in privacy settings. Due to the volume of streaming data, it can take up to 30 days for your full archive to be prepared and sent.

name: Reddit
notes: Your personal data file includes posts, comments, messages, and saved content. The archive is generated periodically and may take some time depending on your activity.

name: Netflix
notes: You can download your viewing history and interaction data. The export link is typically found within your account's privacy settings. Data is usually available quickly.

name: Twitch
notes: Request data download from your privacy settings. For large archives, such as extensive chat logs or broadcast history, it may take several days to be processed and made available.

name: Discord
notes: Request your data through User Settings > Privacy & Safety. The archive includes messages, attachments, user settings, and more. Processing time varies with data size.

name: Microsoft Account
notes: Allows you to manage and download data across various Microsoft services including Outlook, Xbox activity, search history, and more. granular control over data types.
